creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: light, sketchy drawing of a 2 putti side by side; L putti seated on a goat; L putti has PR arm raised; brown ink; mounted onto sheet with brown and pink borders
inscription:
Inscription

Verso of mat, in pencil, later hand: [Stefano della Bella. Two Children with a Goat. Coll: Earl of Southesk, Kainnaird [sic] Castle]
provenance: Charles Noel, 1st Earl of Gainsborough (1781-1866), Kinnaird Castle (part of della Bella album); his daughter, who married 9th Earl of Southesk, Master of Kinnaird Castle; [Arcade Gallery, London, 1946; broke up album]. Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Two Putti on a Goat
